Class Admin

  • java.lang.Object
    • User
      • Employee
        • Admin

  • public class Admin
extends Employee
    This is a subclass derived from Employee. This class does several operations: converts string to date, adds customer to the system, shows customers, shows the informations of the admin who are asked, creates campaign and changes the password.
    Version:
    1.8.0 121
    Author:
    Ahmet Melih Tanriyakul
